name: Ministre 2
description:
A short story about politics and pajamas.

Zeph and I missed the  registrations for GGJ at our local spot so we improvised a small homemade jam about DUCKS. We used the same two days as regular GGJ and made this little game. After we were done, I continued working on it so it would be a little more polished, but there's no english translation for the moment.

Any key : skip text

Arrow keys : control the duck

Esc/Return : Enter and quit the pause menu

Sound by Zeph, program by Ramo!
